name: ExCEL (Before & After School)
description: The BACR mission is to promote healthy development of individuals, families and communities. BACR in partnership with ExCEL and DCYF is happy to announce that they are offering a program for incoming K–5th grade students. The program offers a wide variety of activities including Academic Support, STEM, Art, Recreation, Soccer, Cooking, Dance and much more.

howToGetIt: To Register: Go to https://bacr.force.com/afterschool/s/login/. Create a new account or log into your existing account. Select “New Registration.” Select “LAKESHORE (SFUSD)” Select - school year – "After School” or - school year- "Before School.”
